website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive built-in dishwasher may not have the bells and whistles of pricier models, but it’ll reliably, quietly, and thoroughly wash and dry a hefty load of dishes.
pros: Extra-large interior holds up to 14 place settings at once
Available in stainless steel, white, and black
cons: Some owners find the silverware basket too small

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, fast and friendly delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered fast and friendly. Installation was easy for my husband, only took a couple hours. We wish the seller would have better explained what adapters would be needed so we could have on hand, but all in an easy installation. My dishes have never sparkled like this before. Seems like there is so much extra room for dishes that my old dishwasher didn't have. I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Wade D Stahr

customer_reviews.title: Severe Damage
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get a response from the seller as of yet, so decided to post as a review. This was something we had delivered to our vacation home and as we are only there once a in a while, I had no choice but to install it as we live over 10 hours away and time is VERY limited. Front panel was dented, had to pry the bottom bracket 'straight' to make work, etc. Love the dishwasher itself, but to pay this much and be forced to install a damaged item I would expect a response at least...
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Domench

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!!  You will regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do you get a low quality dishwasher it will be very damaged when it shows up. Mine had the protective box damaged, protective foam obliterated, large dent in the door, front leg smashed, interior rack bent and completely knocked loose. Amazon if you are reading I have made over 400 orders this year and a good customer. Maybe you should add a category to apply for some sort of discount for damaged stuff. Maybe fix the app so people can actually add photos. I was really looking forward to sharing the photos I took.
customer_reviews.author: James Roeder

customer_reviews.title: So damaged its comical
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to have before Christmas and oh by golly was I surprised. I got it Christmas eve and my mom opened up a dishwasher that was so bent up it looks like someone beat it with a bat..... It's almost comical how terrible it is. Really disappointed with this item. I will be returning it the day after Christmas. Wish there was a way to put zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Less than 30 days and stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this dishwasher and the price was great. Unfortunately, looks are deceiving. After less than 30 days the dishwasher stopped working. Mid cycle just went dead. Luckily, it happened before the 30 day return window and amazon has been great working with me for the refund, and arranging for the installation of a new dishwasher and waiving the fees to have the new installed. Sometimes you get what you pay for and that is the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Castro

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, product did not come with most of the hardware and it should
customer_reviews.author: ruben munoz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and after a year and a half it broke. I upload a picture to show what was inside as to why it wasn't working. This is a potential fire hazard and could potentially burn down house. I called and they stated since it is after the one year warranty there is nothing they could do for me. They do not stand behind their equipment even when it could put their customers at a safety risk. Please do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cresci

customer_reviews.title: Residue Left in Dishes (First Uses!) Doesn’t clean corner dishes
customer_reviews.text: I’m unhappy with this dishwasher but it’s already installed, so what am I doing to do 🤷🏻‍♀️ We’ve been using brand name Cascade, rinse aid, etc, but dishes have been having residue on them (not dirty from cooking, but residue that was sprayed around during the cycle I imagine). Also, the spray heads must not be long enough because the dishes in the corners remain dirty after the cycle. For a brand new dishwasher, I’m not happy. Update 5/20/2020: I have figured out if I always run it on the “heavy wash” cycle instead of “normal”, it does a decent job of getting the dishes clean (although not 100%).
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DISHWASHER
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo glad our dishwasher of 25 years died! I found this great Frigidaire dishwasher at a very reasonable price. It has soo many wonderful cycles and it has come a far cry further than our old one. Super quiet too as a bonus! I don’t scrub the dishes anymore before I put them in. Just rinse excess food and load them in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jozie

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY AN APPLIANCE ON AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Got the dishwasher in a completely mangled half nissing box and it was all dented called amazon they gave me a discount since most damage was cosmetic...well now roughly 3 months later the unit doesnt work anymore NEVER EVER EVER BUY AN APPLIANCE OFF AMAZON! I never will again this is a load of you know what!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Why
customer_reviews.text: This was damaged an they didn’t send me another one. So I had to order one I don’t like
customer_reviews.author: Jody H

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The "black stainless" isn't as metallic-looking as I'd hoped, more plastic looking. But it doesn't show the smudges. Seems to work fine so far...cleans better than our previous whirlpool. Was a little difficult to install cuz doesn't come with options for adapting. Had to get a few things at hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: UseItUpWearItOut

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Yet another dishwasher that you have to pre wash the dishes no matter what detergent I use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!! Very Happy!!! Squeaky Clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dishwasher. Works fantastic. I thought my old dishwasher worked. But was time for an upgrade. I was wrong, this is how a dishwasher should work. Litterly squeaky clean. And they are dry. Only bad was shipping people don't take care when moving. Front panel was dented, but I fixed it. Works fantastic!!! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E.

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher quit working after 4 months and Amazon won't help.
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher has quit working properly after 4 months. It does not drain the water after completing the cycle and has overflowed twice ruining our laminate floors. Also the cancel button only works about half the time and is takes 3 90 second cycles to get all the water out. Amazon won't help as the return window has expired. Tech department had me on hold for ever and then I got disconnected and still no help.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and product perfect. I was worried about dents and so on from other reviews but absolutely no issues. Also others criticized buying other package which is typical when you buy a dishwasher any where. Furthermore I had it delivered onto the porch in TWO DAYS when all the big box stores where talking weeks for the black stainless. Last but not least. My wife is very happy with how it cleans and it is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and cleans great.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is beautiful and it works great, much better than a more expensive Samsung that it replaced. The door has two small dents that are not very noticeable so I decided to keep it. See photo’s.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet!!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet...top rack is a bit short. Can’t fit tall glasses up there. Also, doesn’t seem to dry very well. Otherwise, seems to work great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was a disaster
customer_reviews.text: I received the dishwasher and the box was beat up. I figured the product would be wrapped safely, but when I got it out of the box, both legs were bent badly and both sides of the door were bent. I know I should have returned it, but I needed it. I won't get an appliance through shipping again. I did get it installed after much bending and adjusting, and it seems to work OK. It's been 3 days now.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Quick turnaround a couple of minor dents but I'm overall happy with the purchase. You get what you pay for as usual. Works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L.

customer_reviews.title: quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: never ever buy another product with frigidaire name on it.very low quality and very bad service.even the chinese brands are better than this by far.
customer_reviews.author: Munim F. Yono

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, and deals wonderfully with the caked on messes! Installation was quick and easy, the only thing I dislike is that it doesn’t have a stainless tub, other then that - great value for price!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, Quiet, no finger prints!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this Dishwasher is exactly what I expected. Only complaint was a small dent that occurred in shipping on the side but was not worth complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: james ward

customer_reviews.title: Bent Bent Bent
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT, I repeat do NOT purchase this item. The dishwasher was so very bent. I purchased it anyway after reading the reviews about others receiving a bent item. Please take heed and know that it will be delivered bent and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: I need installation that is the only reason is because it came with installation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered with install and have not heard when install is scheduled for
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blumenfrld

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry
customer_reviews.text: We have it for 7 months and the blue spray handle inside broke and melted on the heating coil. doesn’t dry; therefore creates a smell after couple of days. They are sending a tech to check it out
customer_reviews.author: Johnc

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job on dishes
customer_reviews.text: The door just falls right all the way down when opened. I dont know if it is broke or that's the way it is or what
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Professional installed. worked twice. now waiting for parts  from fridgidare!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work! Repairman came and realized he needed another part! Still does not work! \ all is well, works great Vendor was 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishwasher: Quiet, cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this dishwasher on sale at Lowe's for $399 during the labor day event. It's very quiet (Sometimes I don't even know it's running when I have the TV on). I haven't had any issues with cleanliness.. it has a sprayer under each rack and on the very top to prevent any dirty water from pooling up on top of the glasses (like my old, cheap kenmore used to do). My only gripe is that you have to press the 'start' button again when you open it while it's washing. I wish it would simply start back when you close it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher quiet compare to my last Maytag easy install ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dishwasher quiet compare to my last Maytag easy install will need appliance cord and 3/4 to 3/8 elbow for water supply
customer_reviews.author: Champagne

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. Control panel went a little more then a year after purchase; would have cost as much as I paid for the unit to repair it. So kicked it to the curb and just bought a new unit from a more highly rated manufacturer. FRIGIDAIRE did nothing to remedy the situation. They dont stand behind their products. I'm done with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: Quite literally the most useless appliance in my house. It’s a very cheap dishwasher and you get what you pay for, so I guess the only person I can be mad at is me. Just know that you'll have to wash your dishes BEFORE you put them in the dishwasher to be washed. I’m convinced once this machine is closed and “cleaning” all it’s really doing a spraying cold water on the dishes. For the love that is all good and holy, save your money and buy a different machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tub will melt
customer_reviews.text: The heat from the water temperature will melt the plastic tub. I learned the hard way. Do not purchase this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke real fast I would never buy this brand again it’s nothing but junk stupid me bought 2 of them and after 3 years got to get a new one Save your money and time get something better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FFID2426TD 24'' Built-in Dishwasher, 24 inch, Black Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: 24'' Built-In Dishwasher Black Stainless Steel Practical has never looked so stylish with Black Stainless Steel, a beautiful new finish. BladeSpray Arm Gives you better water coverage for a thorough clean every time. Heated Dry Heating element helps dry your dishes the first time. DishSense Technology Automatically adjusts the cycle time based on how much cleaning your dishes need. 2 - 6 Hour Delay Start Set your dishwasher to run on your schedule. It can be set to run 2, 4 or 6 hours in advance. Multiple-Cycle Option Features easy-to-use cleaning cycle options including Top Rack, Rinse Only and Heavy Wash. Polymer Interior Supports the drying process, keeping dishes dry the first time.
feature_bullets: 24'' Built-In Dishwasher Black Stainless Steel Practical has never looked so stylish with Black Stainless Steel, a beautiful new finishBladeSpray Arm Gives you better water coverage for a thorough clean every time.
Black Stainless Steel Practical has never looked so stylish with Black Stainless Steel, a beautiful new finish.
Heated Dry Heating element helps dry your dishes the first time.
DishSenseTM Technology Automatically adjusts the cycle time based on how much cleaning your dishes need.
2 - 6 Hour Delay Start Set your dishwasher to run on your schedule. It can be set to run 2, 4 or 6 hours in advance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars65 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
